Title: Battle Pet Tamers: Cataclysm
Description:
Northrend has fallen to your hand, but you are not yet ready to face the grand masters of Pandaria. Defeat these tamers to harden your will for the coming challenges: Brok in Mount Hyjal, Bordin Steadyfist in Deepholm, and Goz Banefury in Twilight Highlands.

Only by defeating them will you be ready to journey to Pandaria.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Brok, Bordin Steadyfist, and Goz Banefury in pet battles.
PortraitGiverText: You have come too far to fail.
PortraitTurnInText: Think you're ready for the next challenge, tamer?
